Name: Queensway
Phrase: So this is hardcore mode. It was pretty hard...

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: I'm sure we've come a long way since the first time we were trained by Finchley, but... To be honest, this one was pretty tough.

Name: Mary
Phrase: You think? This difficulty is standard back in my day.

Name: Putra
Phrase: How long ago was back in your day, Mary?

Name: Mary
Phrase: That is confidential information.

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: How old is Mary?

Name: Mary
Phrase: That too is confidential information.

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: Strong women like Ohana and Mary have a lot to hide, Yoshino wonders which one of them is older than the other...

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: Oui~iii♪ Yoshino, come over here now and assemble machine parts together with your big sis here~♪

Name: Mary
Phrase: By the way, those intruders you saw were both small, weren't they, Queensway? You said one of them is a Nishikese, is the other one a shana by any chance?

Name: Queensway
Phrase: The shana... If you ask me, she's probably as small as your average Nishikese beastfolk, so it's possible she could be a shana.

Name: Mary
Phrase: A Nishikese sorceress and a shana swordswoman? This is yet another one of those troublesome matters.

Name: Queensway
Phrase: But what makes you think she's a shana? Isn't the shana race really rare, Vivienne?

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: Oui, the tribe members are very rare, even inside Verforet. They basically never leave outside Brécheliant.

Name: Mary
Phrase: I know. That's my perception of the shana tribe too.

Name: Mary
Phrase: But somehow I sense the presence of a shana. This one smells a bit different from the shana tribe we know.

Name: Mary
Phrase: ...Especially from the third locker from our right.

Name: Queensway
Phrase: Third from the right...

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: Just to confirm here, all the lockers are locked.

Name: Mary
Phrase: I'll destroy just that locker then. There's nothing wrong with destroying one.

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: Ooooh- Mary is a strong woman after all.

Name: Putra
Phrase: Yo! Gorilla teacher!

Name: Miyako
Phrase: They looked through my sorceries...

Name: Versailles
Phrase: The Iris Cloud Allied Forces are no pushovers. The dormitory superintendent and the teacher in this academy are no ordinary people.

Name: Versailles
Phrase: It can't be helped. we'll have to concede...".

Name: Versailles
Phrase: Wait! Don't attack!
Just as Mary readied her sword to destroy the locker, a shana girl jumped out of the third locker from the right. Following her, a Nishikese girl also appeared.

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: That's odd, the volume of those two clearly exceeded the locker's capacity...

Name: Putra
Phrase: No, don't take it that seriously.

Name: Queensway
Phrase: She really is a shana swordswoman. I wonder how Mary saw through that.

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: You look very familiar, sorceress of Nishiki...

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: Oooh! Couldn't help but stare.

Name: Mary
Phrase: So you two are the intruders. I wonder if it was your sorceress who used her magic to activate the training ground's system?

Name: Mary
Phrase: Identify yourselves, tell us who you are. Then, I'll decide whether to attack you or not.

Name: Versailles
Phrase: I-I am a knight of the Order of St. Iris of Iris Cloud! This one here, the best Nishikese sorceress is, err...".

Name: Versailles
Phrase: A doll otaku!

Name: Miyako
Phrase: Eh, what's with that set-up? You're so bad at improvs.

Name: Versailles
Phrase: Just tag along with me okay?

Name: Miyako
Phrase: Umm... hi, I'm a doll otaku.

Name: Mary
Phrase: So, a knight-errant of the Order of St. Iris, and a Nishikese doll otaku, I see. So? Why were you hiding here? I've heard there was a sighting of you two being suspicious in the dorms, what were you doing there?

Name: Versailles
Phrase: That's...

Name: Miyako
Phrase: W-We were hungry, so we wanted some food.

Name: Miyako
Phrase: But we felt a very terrifying power at the entrance to the dormitory... I don't know if it was sorcery or magic, but we knew we shouldn't stay there.

Name: Putra
Phrase: (It's Ohana.)

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: (It's Ohana, isn't it?)

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: (It's definitely Ohana.)

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: If what you say is true, then Yoshino thinks you're related to neither the SSS nor the Knight's Academy.

Name: Mary
Phrase: I certainly think so. The fact that you were caught in Ohana's watch list is proof that you are 'uninvited guests'.

Name: Mary
Phrase: If you underestimate our matron, you will die.

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: Calling yourself a 'Knight of the Order of St. Iris of Iris Cloud' is weird for Yoshino. It's full-blown, full-power shady.

Name: Versailles
Phrase: Drat!

Name: Miyako
Phrase: That's what I've told you, Versailles.

Name: Mary
Phrase: I'm going to ask you one more time. Why are you here?

Name: Versailles
Phrase: Our purpose is to...

Name: Versailles
Phrase: To hone our swordsmanship in this training ground and, um...".

Name: Versailles
Phrase: W-We're just here to storm the dojo!

Name: Miyako
Phrase: Versailles, you make too many mistakes. You're a terrible liar and a terrible actor. Why do you go the extra mile of digging your own grave?

Name: Mary
Phrase: I see.

Name: Mary
Phrase: Very well, I accept your challenge, dojo stormer. If you beat me, you are free to use this training ground.

Name: Mary
Phrase: And as St. Irish knight, I will recognise your talent and let you off the hook this time.

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: What are you on about, Mary?

Name: Mary
Phrase: Right, let me ask the Conductor for permission. Conductor, may I have a bout with these girls?
Go ahead. Take it away, Mary.

Name: Mary
Phrase: I have my superior's permission.

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: Bozhe, the disciple is acting exactly like the master...

Name: Mary
Phrase: Now then, Miss Dojo Stormer. It's time for some sword practice. Come at me from wherever you are.

Name: Versailles
Phrase: I-I don't know what it is, but this is our one chance! If I can beat that teacher and get her to let us go, we can buy ourselves some time!

Name: Miyako
Phrase: That's right. You can do it, Versailles.

Name: Versailles
Phrase: Of course. If it's a one-on-one match, I won't lose!

Name: Mary
Phrase: I see we've come to an agreement.

Name: Versailles
Phrase: Let's not forget our previous terms, shall we?

Name: Mary
Phrase: Of course. A knight never goes back on her word.

Name: Versailles
Phrase: En garde! I will show you what the Railway Knights of Metro St. Iris can do!

Name: Miyako
Phrase: Aah, you and your big mouth-
